title.rendered: Dr. Pearlman is Interviewed by USA Today about the Unsolicited Aesthetic Assessment Posted on TikTok of Stranger Things Star, Natalia Dyer

content.rendered:
Dr. Steven Pearlman, shared his thoughts with USA Today on the controversial TikTok of an Aesthetic Nurse Practitioner commenting on what cosmetic treatments she would do to enhance Stranger Things Star, Natalia Dyer’s appearance.

“If someone wants to alter their looks, their face or their image, then as a facial plastic surgeon, I’m all for it. But it is not up to us to determine and promote our skills by demeaning the looks of anyone— celebrity or not,” says Dr. Pearlman.

Dr. Pearlman continues, “Tagging and denigrating someone just because they are a celebrity is an easy way to get visibility. Unfortunately, the way physicians and nurse injectors get visibility these days is too often from sensationalism on social media,”

READ FULL ARTICLE

VISIT OUR RENOWNED NEW YORK CITY PRACTICE IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO LEARN MORE ABOUT AESTHETIC SERVICEs AT PEARLMAN AESTHETIC SURGERY

Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery is a Manhattan plastic surgery practice off of Park Avenue. At Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery, we help our patients to actualize the best possible version of themselves, restoring a sense of self-confidence and comfort in their own skin. Through innovative, cutting-edge technology coupled with an intuitive understanding of how to accomplish each patient’s unique objectives, Dr. Pearlman and Dr. Stein consistently deliver exceptional cosmetic surgery results.

Our approach is always centered on our core values: outstanding care, innovation, compassion, transparency, and accountability. With years of experience serving patients from New York City, the United States, and world wide with our premier treatments and unmatched service, we love providing individualized care for the best results possible.

PROCEDURE MATCH TOOL
